name: Jumpy Ninja (Mr anonymous1)
description:
Hello to everyone.

It is a simple game which you can play whenever you have some free time and you wanna play an easy but also a challenging game. The only thing you have to do is beat every highscore you make. You press 'play' pick the mode you want and start running. 

I hope you enjoy the game and please let me know how you feel about it. Feedback is really important so leave your comment below. Thank you and hope you have a great time playing it. 

*You can jump by clicking any button.

**You can doublejump but be careful... Doublejump may save you last minute but it may kill you too. So use it wisely. Remember.. It is all about rythm.

Good luck :)
